entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `name` TEXT NOT NULL, `extension` TEXT NOT NULL, `category_id` INTEGER NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY(`category_id`) REFERENCES `categories`(`id`) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE )

views.createSql:
CREATE VIEW `${VIEW_NAME}` AS SELECT 
    c.id AS id,
    c.name AS name,
    COUNT(DISTINCT i.id) AS image_count,
    COUNT(DISTINCT a.id) AS audio_count
FROM 
    categories c
LEFT JOIN 
    Images i ON c.id = i.category_id
LEFT JOIN 
    Audios a ON c.id = a.category_id
GROUP BY 
    c.id, c.name;
